title: Caleb Mogyabiyedom
text: Hello, My name is Caleb Mogyabiyedom and I am Econ major. I’m from Ghana and I love playing and watching football. My favourite team is Arsenal(COYG!!!)

title: Premier League Match Analysis
text:
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(ggplot2)
tuesdata <- tt_load('2023-04-04')

---- Compiling #TidyTuesday Information for 2023-04-04 ----
--- There is 1 file available ---


── Downloading files ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

  1 of 1: "soccer21-22.csv"

soccer <- tuesdata$soccer
colnames(soccer)

 [1] "Date"     "HomeTeam" "AwayTeam" "FTHG"     "FTAG"     "FTR"     
 [7] "HTHG"     "HTAG"     "HTR"      "Referee"  "HS"       "AS"      
[13] "HST"      "AST"      "HF"       "AF"       "HC"       "AC"      
[19] "HY"       "AY"       "HR"       "AR"      

ggplot(soccer,aes(x=HS, y=FTHG))+
 geom_point()+
 labs(title = "Relationship Between Shots taken and Goals Scored By Home Teams",
      x= "Number of shots", y= "Number of goals")







#source of data: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2023/2023-04-04/readme.md and https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/evangower/premier-league-match-data
